Brandan Chen, Financial Planner at Manulife SingaporeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019There is no good time. What matters is your time in the market. Sounds cliche but this is how it works.If you are still considering/seeking advice about buying individual stocks, perhaps you may not be ready for such investments yet. Suggest that instead of stock picking, you pick up a basket of stocks by investing into an ETF, Unit Trust, Roboadvisors etc1 comment0
